title: Sepultura - Against - Nation (Remaster 2008)
description:
Roadrunner Records repackages two well-known (and out of print any other way) titles in Sepultura&#039;s back catalog for reissue here. Against, released in 1998, contains 15 cuts with the amazing instrumentals "Kamaitachi" and "T3rcermillennium," and Nation, released in 2001, features "Valtio," "Vox Populi," and "One Man Army." It&#039;s all killer, no filler on these, even if the primal blast of the band has been built upon texturally and musically.
